document.full_text: coaches alain vigneault and claude julien keep in regular contact, but do not expect them to exchange any phone calls until it is decide which man will hoist the nhl's stanley cup in victory.
document.title: stanley cup coaches friends and rivals
lines_and_colors: coaches alain vigneault and claude julien keep in regular contact, but do not expect them to exchange any phone calls until it is decide which man will hoist the nhl's stanley cup in victory.
